get.description: This API list the fields & its comparators allowed in criteria form for the specified module & feature name. Available condition types are @text@,@date@,@datetime@,@dateTimePair@,@integer@,@user@,@team@,@boolean@,@lookup@,@keyword@,@enum@ & @picklist@

parameters.name: featureName
parameters.description: feature name to be fetched. Allowed values are : @bp_criteria_fields@, @bp_configurefields@,@direct_assignrules@,@roundrobin@,@sla@,@supervise_fields@,@wf@,@cv_criteria@,@report_criteria@,@report_standard_filter@,@layoutrules_primaryfields@,@validationrules_primaryfields@,@layoutrules_secondaryfields@,@validationrules_secondaryfields@,@advanced_search_criteria@,@gamification@,@skill_criteria_fields@,@dotwalk@,@bulk_ui_export_fields@,@automation_engine@, @locked_tickets_fields@.

schema.description: feature name to be fetched. Allowed values are : @bp_criteria_fields@, @bp_configurefields@,@direct_assignrules@,@roundrobin@,@sla@,@supervise_fields@,@wf@,@cv_criteria@,@report_criteria@,@report_standard_filter@,@layoutrules_primaryfields@,@validationrules_primaryfields@,@layoutrules_secondaryfields@,@validationrules_secondaryfields@,@advanced_search_criteria@,@gamification@,@skill_criteria_fields@,@dotwalk@,@bulk_ui_export_fields@,@automation_engine@, @locked_tickets_fields@.
